response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price. Given its value and your interest, I propose we make it a win-win situation. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product to you for $95. This price not only reflects the high quality and worth of the item but also allows us to share the benefits. Please let me know if this proposal suits your expectations.", "product_price": 95}
